documentation.text:
@title YearnVaultAdapter
 @dev A vault adapter implementation which wraps a yEarn vault.

attributes.text:
@title YearnVaultAdapter
 @dev A vault adapter implementation which wraps a yEarn vault.

devdoc.details: A vault adapter implementation which wraps a yEarn vault.

params._amount: the amount of tokens to deposit into the vault.

indirectWithdraw(address,uint256).details: Sends vault tokens to the recipient This function reverts if the caller is not the admin.

params._amount: the amount of tokens to send.
params._recipient: the account to send the tokens to.

token().details: Gets the token that the vault accepts.

totalValue().details: Gets the total value of the assets that the adapter holds in the vault.

updateApproval().details: Updates the vaults approval of the token to be the maximum value.

withdraw(address,uint256).details: Withdraws tokens from the vault to the recipient. This function reverts if the caller is not the admin.

params._amount: the amount of tokens to withdraw.
params._recipient: the account to withdraw the tokes to.

devdoc.title: YearnVaultAdapter
